de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.distancefunction

Interface WeightedNumberVectorDistanceFunction<V>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - Vector type, usually NumberVector or above.
    All Superinterfaces:
    DistanceFunction<V>, NumberVectorDistanceFunction<V>, PrimitiveDistanceFunction<V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    WeightedCanberraDistanceFunction, WeightedEuclideanDistanceFunction, WeightedLPNormDistanceFunction, WeightedManhattanDistanceFunction, WeightedMaximumDistanceFunction, WeightedPearsonCorrelationDistanceFunction, WeightedSquaredEuclideanDistanceFunction, WeightedSquaredPearsonCorrelationDistanceFunction

    public interface WeightedNumberVectorDistanceFunction<V>
extends NumberVectorDistanceFunction<V>
    Distance functions where each dimension is assigned a weight.
    Since:
    0.4.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static OptionID WEIGHTS_ID
      Parameter to set the weights of the weighted distance function.
